items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
items.title: admin-remix/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

items.content_html: QuickSQL is a fast, lightweight database solution for Node.js, optimized for quick data retrieval and manipulation. Designed to handle complex data types including objects and arrays, QuickSQL offers efficient, in-memory caching, supports a variety of SQL operations, and provides built-in tools for seamless data management.
items.title: DevTerminator69/QuickSQL: QuickSQL is a fast, lightweight database solution for Node.js, optimized for quick data retrieval and manipulation. Designed to handle complex data types including objects and arrays, QuickSQL offers efficient, in-memory caching, supports a variety of SQL operations, and provides built-in tools for seamless data management.
